It is a very fun and competitive game. It is super easy to get a hang of, but insanely hard to master. If you're up to playing one of the most popular Tactical FPS games, and are looking for a high skill ceiling, then look no further.

I definitely recommend this game for those who are very interested in E-sports since this game has a thriving E-sports scene. If you can look past the outdated graphics and sound system, maybe even mechanics too, this is a great game to play and be invested in because of the countless players playing against and with each other and seeing many stories form from this game.
